casebody.data:
STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. ERWIN McDONALD, whose true name is ERVIN McDonald, Appellant. (No. C-59629) 494 P2d 904 F. E. Glenn, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem. John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief was Lee Johnson, Attorney General, Salem.

Argued March 28,

affirmed March 28,

petition for rehearing denied April 25, petition for review denied August 1, 1972

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Foley and Fort, Judges.
